name: IKScannerDeviceView
desc: The IKScannerDeviceView class displays a view that allows scanning. It can be customized by specifying the display mode. The delegate receives the scanned data and must implement the IKScannerDeviceViewDelegate protocol.

items.name: var mode: IKScannerDeviceViewDisplayMode
items.desc: The display mode used by the device view.

items.name: var hasDisplayModeAdvanced: Bool
items.desc: The property that determines whether the scanner view uses the advanced display mode.

items.name: var hasDisplayModeSimple: Bool
items.desc: The property that determines whether the scanner view uses the simple display mode.

items.name: var displaysDownloadsDirectoryControl: Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the downloads directory control is displayed.

items.name: var downloadsDirectory: URL!
items.desc: The directory where scans are saved.

items.name: var transferMode: IKScannerDeviceViewTransferMode
items.desc: Determines how the scanned content is provided to the delegate.

items.name: var displaysPostProcessApplicationControl: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the post processing application control is displayed.

items.name: var postProcessApplication: URL!
items.desc: The URL of the application to use for post processing of the scan.

items.name: enum IKScannerDeviceViewTransferMode
items.desc: These constants determine how the scanner data is returned to the delegate. They are used by the transferMode property.

items.name: enum IKScannerDeviceViewDisplayMode
items.desc: These constants specify the display mode the scanner view will use. They are used by the mode property.
